pr_title: [DOCS] Add data streams to remove lifecycle policy API

timeline.message: [DOCS] Add data streams to remove lifecycle policy API
[DOCS] Add data streams to remove lifecycle policy API

timeline.bodyText: I think this is ambiguous, by calling it the "Remove lifecycle policy API" it makes it sound like this removes the actual policy, maybe something like "Remove lifecycle policy from index API" or "Detach lifecycle policy API"?
timeline.author: dakrone
timeline.diffHunk:
@@ -1,17 +1,18 @@
 [role="xpack"]
 [testenv="basic"]
 [[ilm-remove-policy]]
-=== Remove policy from index API
+=== Remove lifecycle policy API

replies.bodyText: Thanks for the feedback @dakrone. I was trying to avoid confusion that the API only target indices, but I agree that this change may cause a more significant confusion. I reverted the change.
replies.author: jrodewig
